title: Plasm.js
description: JavaScript functional programming library for solid modelling based on dimension-independent geometric kernel

title: Simplexn.js
description: JavaScript multi-dimensional geometric kernel based on simplicial complex for 3D solid modelling

title: LAR.js
description: JavaScript multi-dimensional geometric kernel based on linear algebraic representation for 3D solid modelling

title: VisPro

title: BAK3D
